name: Bliss Maze(极乐迷宫)
description: A multiplayer online counter - terror game.Players paint their characters' skins, record their voices, enter the jungle of bliss, a place of terror guarded by "her," and fight for the power of Buddha seals through worship.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Windows Vista / Windows 7/Windows 10 Processor: 3.2GHZ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GT430  2G Storage: 2 GB available space
